alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 20 at 9:56AM MDT until May 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Far Northeast Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds are expected along north-south and northwest-southeast oriented roads such as Route 1950 in the northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Interstate 25 from near Raton to Las Vegas.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
